original_text: In my vision, I saw the soldiers and their horses. The soldiers had shields over the front of their bodies. The shields had many colours. They were bright red like fire, bright blue, and yellow like sulphur. The horses' heads looked like lions' heads. Fire, smoke and sulphur came out of their mouths.
korean_text: 이같은 환상 가운데 그 말들과 그 위에 탄 자들을 보니 불빛과 자줏빛과 유황빛 호심경이 있고 또 말들의 머리는 사자 머리 같고 그 입에서는 불과 연기와 유황이 나오더라

sentences.original_text: In my vision, I saw the soldiers and their horses
sentences.korean_translation: 내 환상에서, 나는 군인들과 그들의 말들을 보았다

sentences.original_text: The soldiers had shields over the front of their bodies
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들은 몸 앞쪽에 방패를 지니고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They were bright red like fire
The horses' heads looked like lions' heads
Fire came out of their mouths
Smoke came out of their mouths
Sulphur came out of their mouths
